briefTitle: Study of Nasonex in the Relief of Nasal Congestion in Patients With Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis (Study P05583)
officialTitle: Placebo-Controlled Study of Mometasone Furoate Nasal Spray (MFNS) 200 mcg QD in the Relief of Nasal Congestion Associated With Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis (SAR)
summary: This study seeks to prospectively demonstrate that Nasonex is better than placebo in relieving nasal congestion in patients with seasonal allergic rhinitis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Average AM/PM PRIOR Nasal Congestion Score Over 15 Days
